subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Officiating (Sports)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The most scrutinized person in Wednesday’s Champions League semifinal will be the referee, Felix Brych, a German with a doctorate in law who may also need an advanced degree in thick skin.
snippet: The most scrutinized person in Wednesday’s Champions League semifinal will be the referee, Felix Brych, a German with a doctorate in law who may also need an advanced degree in thick skin.
